Posts.Content: jennsdogs wrote: I am 40 years old. Just had a radical mastectomy with latissimus dorsi reconstruction.  Results show ErPr+ and Her2 Nu +.  All lymph nodes were clean!  Is there anyone around my age that has this? I was wondering if you had to have chemo. My surgeon said I would but is waiting for 3 weeks after surgery to refer me to a oncologist.  I didn't know what type of chemo they will recommend?  I have 2 young kids and no family in the area.  Questioning if I had to have to hard stuff or mild???
